reviewText: Delightfully cheesy collection of 2 wrestling movies and one starring legendary wrestler Roddy Piper. Video quality okay, but nothing to write home about. Worth it if you find it at a good price just for the inclusion of the vintage footage of the Shiek in the ring!

All 3 of these films are a must have for longtime wrestling fans! GRUNT! and I Like to Hurt People especially. Hell Comes to Frogtown isn't necessarily a wrestling flick but is a fun science fiction movie starring Roddy Piper. The surviving Farhat sons have on occassion have said they are going to make a sequel called I Like To Hurt People Too. So far they haven't delivered but still run an indy league called AWWL in the midwest that has staged tributes to The Sheik over the years.

Haven't watched it yet.  Just the fact that I got it, in new condition, for such a bargain is worth the 5 star rating.  Once I watch it, I will chime in again.  No possibility of being let down unless the DVD just doesn't play.  Other than that all my expectations have been met.
5 stars all the way for this bad boy. Happy that Grunt! the wresting movie finally made it to DVD. All three movies are solid. Would recommend this for any true wrestling fan.
I don't even know what to say....
Was exactly what I remember! I've been looking for this for years, and finally ran across it! Very  very grateful!
loved I like to hurt people
My friend loved the movies. Thank you.
Hell Comes to Frogtown is the best movie ever
A good trio of wrestling movies with some of the best superstars.
